fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Perform the faction action (Kill, Douse, Roleblock...)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be assigned a random faction at the start of the game, Getting their goal and joining their chat.
- If you win, You will get a `@Scroll`(if host agrees).
- You may reroll out of this for free.
